title: Phase distribution and probabilistic risk assessment of polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons in indoor air of coffee shops at Zahedan, Iran
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Shahnaz Sargazi, Seyed Mehdi Tabatabaei, Mohammad Hassan Ehrampoush, Ramin Saravani, Mohammad Javad Zare Sakhvidi, Hossein Fallahzadeh, Ali Asghar Ebrahimi
